tagline: Tool shed to store environment setup and customizations
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Environments
body:
Ok so the idea here is to list out various environment setups and scripts incase of computer death as well as have somewhere to reference for improvements.

## NPM Packages

## Sublime Packages

* FileDiffs

## Sublime Settings

```
{
# makes the sidebar a little easier to understand
"bold_folder_labels": true,

# looks cool :p
"caret_style": "phase",

# adds a subtle highlight to the current line
"highlight_line": true,

# in general this is good practice
"translate_tabs_to_spaces": true,

# trims trailing whitespace
"trim_trailing_white_space_on_save": true,

# I don't like to work at the very bottom of my screen
"scroll_past_end": true,
}
```
